name: record-shop-fullsteak
description: frontend und backend gleichzeitig laufen lassen

scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run frontend" "npm run backend"
scripts.dependencies: npm install; git submodule init; git submodule update; cd record-shop-backend; yarn checkout solution/06-validation; yarn add nodemon; cd ..; npx yarn install-all
scripts.install-all: ( cd record-shop-backend; npx yarn install; ); ( cd record-shop-frontend; npx yarn install; );

author: fbw9@dus
